Class AceRuleVisitor

java.lang.Object
visitor.AceRuleVisitor
All Implemented Interfaces:
ScoreVisitor
public class AceRuleVisitor extends Object implements ScoreVisitor
Visitor for applying the Ace scoring rule. An Ace becomes worth 5 points if it's the only card of its suit in the Jest.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Hazri and Sophea

      Checks if an Ace is alone in its suit.
      Parameters:

    • getAceValue

      public int getAceValue(Suit suit)
      Gets the value of an Ace in a specific suit.
      Parameters:
      suit - The suit to check
      Returns:
      5 if alone, 1 otherwise
